text: ¶ And when they began to sing and to praise, the LORD set ambushments against the children of Ammon, Moab, and mount Seir, which were come against Judah; and they were smitten.20.22 And when…: Heb. And in the time that they, etc20.22 to sing…: Heb. in singing and praise20.22 they were…: or, they smote one another
